channel.title: Bugs in Interloper and Gonarch's lair
channel.description: Some missing clipping which results in getting easily out of the map at the end of bm_c4a3a1 and skipping trigger which opens areaportal near the beginning on bm_c4a3b1. https://imgur.com/a/kSl7QyY Fences near drop of barrels and sucking water tube are non solid. https://imgur.com/a/kiYtK8w Gonarch can still kick you out of the playable area during the first fight by throwing column at you. Also in cave after the fight one web is visible only from 1 side. https://imgur.com/a/KsRfESi

item.title: Bugs in Interloper and Gonarch's lair
item.dc:creator: jerzyn
item.description:
Some missing clipping which results in getting easily out of the map at the end of bm_c4a3a1 and skipping trigger which opens areaportal near the beginning on bm_c4a3b1.

[Album] Missing clipping Interloper 

Fences near drop of barrels and sucking water tube are non solid.
[Album] Missing collision Interloper 

Gonarch can still kick you out of the playable area during the first fight by throwing column at you. Also in cave after the fight one web is visible only from 1 side.
[Album] Gonarch's lair bugs

Read full topic
item.source: Bugs in Interloper and Gonarch's lair
